title: SK Group chairman says rapid growth for AI data centres creating bottlenecks
description: The explosive growth in artificial intelligence data centres is creating "bottlenecks" for chips and other key supplies, SK Group Chairman Chey Tae-won said on Tuesday.
content:

title: Wikipedia vs Grokipedia: 5 Key Differences Between Elon Musk's AI-Powered Rival & World's Largest Online Encyclopedia
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company xAI has launched Grokipedia 0.1, positioning it as a direct rival to Wikipedia, the world’s most-visited online encyclopedia. Marketed as a “truth-seeking knowledge base”, the platform is powered by xAI’s conversational model Grok and is already integrated with Musk’s social media platform X.

title: EIB executive says more jobs will be created than lost from AI

content:
